headline: Wall Street Bulls Look Optimistic About Booking Holdings (BKNG): Should You Buy?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Booking Holdings (BKNG) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Can Booking's Connected Trip Strategy Define Its Long-Term Investment Story After Q4 Call? (BKNG)
summary: Booking Holdings has scheduled a conference call on February 18, 2026 to discuss its fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, following several quarters in which analysts have highlighted stronger earnings and resilient travel activity across its platforms. An important angle for investors is how initiatives like the Connected Trip and growing multi-reservation usage could reshape how travelers bundle and book their journeys globally. Next, we’ll examine how these earnings expectations and...
